channel.title: ::Players command
channel.description: Everytime I type ::players on my server it says there are people online when there aren't for example i would type ::players it will say that there are 14 players online and i type it again and it says there are 4 online. Anyone know how to fix? Btw my server is Delta based.

item.title: ::Players command
item.dc:creator: @ElmosWorld ElmosWorld
item.description:
@ElmosWorld wrote:

    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) {
       sM("There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players online!");

}

Read full topic

item.title: ::Players command
item.dc:creator: @TheCod3r TheCod3r
item.description:
@TheCod3r wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:509345”][quote author=ElmosWorld link=topic=627593.msg4265672#msg4265672 date=1364023655]
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“players”)) {

    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) {
       sM("There are currently " + (PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() * 2 + (int) (Math.random() * 10D)) + " players online!");

}
}
[/quote]

Use the code I sent you in PM.[/quote]
You Should post the code here so if someone ever needs the code, it will be here for them, im just saying.

Read full topic
